```{r setup, include=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(conflicted)
suppressMessages(conflict_prefer("filter", "dplyr"))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse))

library(readxl)
```

# Info
Data from Touchton, Michael <miketouchton@miami.edu> Friday, April 17, 2020 at 9:08 PM A few updates
Chiapas and Nuevo Leon

## Pre-processing
The bottom of the sheets (total and legends were removed)

## Notes:
Written approval to put sheets on web is pending

```{r}
Chiapas <- read_xlsx("./data/Copy of Update Chiapas.Nuevo Leon.xlsx", sheet = "Chiapas")
NuevoLeon <- read_xlsx("./data/Copy of Update Chiapas.Nuevo Leon.xlsx", sheet = "Nuevo Leon")

setdiff(names(Chiapas), names(NuevoLeon)) 
setdiff(names(NuevoLeon)) 


analysis <- bind_rows(
  Chiapas %>% mutate(place = "Chiapas"),
  NuevoLeon %>% mutate(place = "Nuevo Leon")
)

saveRDS(analysis, "./data/chiapas_leon.rds")
```
